website_summaries.verdict: The total all-in-one solution for cleaning and repairing the radiator without extensive repair work.
pros: Stops overheating and reduces water temperature
Uses two separate, dedicated fluids to clean minor deposits and debris while fixing coolant/oil leaks
Capable of stopping larger leaks than other coolant repair products
cons: Cleaning results are lackluster compared to more dedicated cleaning solutions

customer_reviews.title: I'll be damn. It works but
customer_reviews.text: I had a pinhole leak in radiator which was spraying all over under pressure. Poured it in radiator and it sealed up leak right away. 2 weeks it's still fine. I'll update regularly After 2 weeks leak back with vengeance..this works for a short time
customer_reviews.author: Drewski

customer_reviews.title: Great to plug leaks
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. The mechanic said I've got a leaky manifold and I'll be damned if I'm gonna get it fixed, because that would cost more than the car. I ordered this, but then decided I couldn't wait. It has gotten to the point where i was leaking water as fast as I was burning gas. Desperate I went into advance Auto parts and bought a bottle. I didn't have to fill my radiator again for two weeks. After a couple of months I put this Amazon bottle in. Now, I still have to keep an eye on it, but I put about a gallon of water a month in.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Savage

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Had my doubts, but this stuff stopped a very persistent leak that was making me refill my expansion tank every day! Not a drop since then (about three months now). Definitely worth every penny and saved me from spending the $2K that the mech wanted to replace all the hoses in and around the engine (I have a Jag). I keep an extra bottle in my garage now just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Matteo

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about it.
customer_reviews.text: Had to pour it in my reserve tank because my radiator was full. Stopped the leak for about a week then the leak came back. After driving through the mountains in the desert it seems to keep my motor cooler than normal but not drastically cool enough to say for sure. I’d just go to a shop to get everything fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Morgenstern

customer_reviews.title: WILL MAKE IT WORSE
customer_reviews.text: THE ONLY THING THAT THIS ADDITIVE DID WAS ADD TO MY PROBLEM. IT CLOGGED ALL COOLING PIPES.
customer_reviews.author: sergio

customer_reviews.title: Works but only temporary
customer_reviews.text: Temporary fix. Works like a band aid but definitely not permanent. Had to keep buying it to help with my coolant loss issue. Only good for a few drives
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: This immediately stopped the pinhole leak in my aluminum return ...
customer_reviews.text: This immediately stopped the pinhole leak in my aluminum return manifold! Been holding for about a month now. So far saved me from having to tear the front of my engine off to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Michaud

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!! worked to on my sink
customer_reviews.text: I had a sink that would drain all the way. I purchased this and follow the instructions and now it works great. With no problems or weird smells. I used some on the tubs too just for precaution.
customer_reviews.author: Luis JrTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be working a few months after using it. Only time will tell the real story.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Adams

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells bad but stopped the leak in the heater core for now 2 months in...
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to rate...helped in a pinch...ended up replacing radiator......
customer_reviews.author: Highpines

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect although, two tries may do more justice
customer_reviews.text: It works. Not perfect although, two tries may do more justice, but I am concerned about clogging up the system.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J. Satkowiak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stopped my 2001 suburu forrester from loosing coolant didnt have to do anything else so it works i guess.
customer_reviews.author: dillon libby

customer_reviews.title: Oil treatment radiator treatment and power steering treatment I have had no problems with it it seems to have helped my vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I have used bars leak in my vehicle four. Oil treatment radiator treatment and power steering treatment I have had no problems with it it seems to have helped my vehicle to run better and never had any aftereffect from it is safe to use
customer_reviews.author: Jim Denice

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: saved my money to fix the car, it worked and my coolant just stopped leaking after applied these
customer_reviews.author: Yuanjian Zhong

customer_reviews.title: Stopped a leak that had started on the plastic tank ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped a leak that had started on the plastic tank on the side of my radiator. Probably not a lifetime fix but it will definitely buy you some more time.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Reasor

customer_reviews.title: That just happened.
customer_reviews.text: Had a gallon per week coolant leak.... now I do not. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but I am keeping it in my storage bins because I know the product works since I have used it in the past. It will seal up small holes if your radiator is leaking. If they are over I would say 1/8 inch in diameter holes than it might be a little less likely to seal the hole up. My father in law introduced me to this product years back and it always worked for him.
customer_reviews.author: r piper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: stuff really work...... get it now and save big money
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle did not work, so I poured in a second one, and it worked and stopped the leak. Not sure if this will be a permanent fix, after a month or two, its still good.
customer_reviews.author: Collectorque

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY MAN - GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: WORKED GREAT ! forgot I had drained my 1955 farmall tractor to replace the anti-freeze last fall. Started it up drove for about 5 minutes, and noticed steam coming from the radiator cap, and realized my mistake. I filled the radiator with water, and I had water pouring out the top and bottom of the radiator. (LOTS OF WATER). thought I would have to take it apart and solder it. After thinking about how much worked would be involved, I decided to try this product to get me back to work. 10 minutes later, the leaks had stopped. HAPPY MAN - GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: macland

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work, followed instructions to the letter and I've still got the same tiny leak.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Tried it on the 2003 crown Vic notorious intake manifold leak. Did not work. Maybe wrong product for the problem.
customer_reviews.author: chris gardner

customer_reviews.title: Added to the problem
customer_reviews.text: I added entire bottle like directions said. The next day driving to work I noticed the heat wasn't getting very warm, the next day I put a thermometer in the vent and the temp. coming out was only 60 degrees. This product clogged the heater core and cost $100 to have it flushed out to where the heater is back to normal. (140 degrees). On the flip side it did stop the small coolant leak coming from the engine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't even stop a small hairline crack from leaking fluid
customer_reviews.text: This stuff couldn't even plug for 2" hairline crack in a radiator. If it can't even do that I'm not sure what the point of it is.
customer_reviews.author: BPoovey

customer_reviews.title: Beware... don't add to antifreeze!
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. Maybe it works with water only. I added it to the antifreeze coolant and it immediately caused the engine to overheat. Clogged up the radistor. What a mess. Good thing I was watching the temperature gauge. Otherwise it would have ruined my engine. Scotty Kilmer on utube warns not to use this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE FARQUHAR

customer_reviews.title: Kind of does and doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Give it to stars because it did stop the leak I had a leak in a 2001 Ford Taurus and I could not find where the leak was but only giving it to stars because it actually cause the vehicle to overheat after pouring the leak repair into coolant reservoir so ended up having to flush entire cooling system and refill with distilled water and flush again to correct the problem but it no longer leaks any coolant would recommend as a quick Band-Aid fix would not recommend as a long-term fix
customer_reviews.author: zakk

customer_reviews.title: Actually stopped the radiator leak.
customer_reviews.text: Although I don't believe you can 'fix' a radiator leak with any of these products I did try this product yesterday to at least temporarily repair a hissing leak in a 2001 Ford Ranger radiator. My previous experience notwithstanding I was mildly surprised when I used this product and it did stop the leak (for now).
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: Seems worked for my car
customer_reviews.text: It actualyl fixed a small leak on my BMW. My car's dash warning light pops up every 2weeks or so. Had to fill up about a quart each time but this product appears fixed just that, no more coolant warning light. A pleasant surprise since i was thinking about collant system overhaul, least $1200+ setback. My car is at 92k miles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a Bar Leaks fine FOREVER.
customer_reviews.text: I had a coolant leak as of 9/21/2015 and WAS TERRIFIED and DEPRESSED just contemplating what the mechanic would "find". I bought this product in desperation w/ faint hope and trust that it would work. I followed the instructions to the letter and IT WORKED. My leak is NO MORE. I am a Bar Leaks fine FOREVER.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: This stopped my coolant leak. I can't believe it ...
customer_reviews.text: This stopped my coolant leak. I can't believe it. I'm still going to do a thorough cooling system and heater block flush.
customer_reviews.author: Oceanfront

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: works for 2 days and now it leaks again waste of money
customer_reviews.author: dana
